long_description:
Adds an API for work with deltatime things.

### deltatime.get([<unit>])
***Gets deltatime float value.***
If unit param is nothing, returns seconds.
If unit param is something like seconds / minutes / hours, it will returns seconds (same as nothing) / minutes / hours.

### deltatime.add(<sec>, <min>, <hour>)
***Adds time in deltatime.***
For example, you want to add 15 seconds in deltatime, you can make it through: `deltatime.add(15, 0, 0)`
name: deltatime
title: DeltaTime
